successes.title: DrinkTanks Offers the World's Largest Growler & Personal Keg
successes.description: COLD, FRESH, & CARBONATED wherever you go! Cast from stainless steel, double wall, vacuum insulated with an Auto-Regulating Keg Cap!

Pledges.description: DrinkTanks Swag - Pick between a stylish trucker hat with stickers or one of our fitted men's or women's tee-shirts with stickers.
The DrinkTanks’ Kegulator an Auto-Regulating Keg Cap can be used with either of our flagship vessels, the 64 oz Classic Growler or the NEW 128 oz Juggernaut Growler.
128 oz Juggernaut Growler, WOW! This is the lowest you will ever see the Juggernaut, EVER! You also have the option to choose from one of our 12 stylish finishes- a Standard Cap is included.

*NEW Pledge* 
The 64 oz Classic Growler with Kegulator, out by your request! This is the lowest you will ever see the Classic 64 oz Growler with a Kegulator! You also have the option to choose from one of our 12 stylish finishes - a Standard Cap is included.

Early Bird Special – 128 oz Juggernaut Growler, double WOW! This is the lowest you will ever see the Juggernaut, EVER with the Kegulator! You also have the option to choose from one of our 12 stylish finishes-a Standard Cap is included.

REVISED SHIPPING
Early Bird Special – 128 oz Juggernaut Growler, double WOW! This is the lowest you will ever see the Juggernaut, EVER with the Kegulator! You also have the option to choose from one of our 12 stylish finishes-a Standard Cap is included.
The 128 oz Juggernaut Growler with the Kegulator and a 1-year DRAFT magazine subscription. You also have the option to choose from one of our 12 stylish finishes-a Standard Cap is included.

Did you miss the early bird special? A little late to the party? No worries! The128 oz Juggernaut Growler with the Kegulator. You also have the option to choose from one of our 12 stylish finishes. Smokin’ deal man! Smokin’ deal!
A Standard Cap is included.

*NEW Pledge* 
The Classic Combo: 1 Classic Growler + 1 Juggernaut combined with 1 Kegulator, and you have all your bases covered. You also have the option to choose from one of our 12 stylish finishes - two standard caps are included.
The Party Pack - Two 128oz Juggernauts with both Standard Caps and our Kegulator. You can also choose from one of our 12 stylish finishes.

Festival Pack – 2 of our 128 oz Juggernaut Growlers and 2 Kegulators with DrinkTanks® T-shirts. Hold the drum roll... additionally, 2 tickets to the Great American Beer Festival in Denver, Colorado on September 24-26, 2015. The tickets for this festival, sold out the last two years in less than one minute! They are NOT yet available.
Dirty Dozen Pack - Includes 12 amazing 128 oz Juggernaut Growlers, 12 Kegulators and 12 Standard Caps. One side custom engraving is available for an additional fee. Mix from our 12 stylish finishes.
